item.title: November 2019
item.description: Duping exploit that Rendi made a video about

item.title: October 2019
item.description: Basilisk Knights buffed after feedback from the high level community, which was controversial because it’s a lvl 60 Slayer monster, but also has the issue of dropping a BIS item.

item.title: September 2019
item.description: OSB released some overpowered plugins (prayer specifically), which caused Jagex to rethink their policy on 3rd party clients and had many afraid of having to go back to using the vanilla client if they decided to ban them outright.

item.title: July 2019
item.description: Warding results in drama Partnerships being a slippery slope into more MTX drama SotE head model changes Dinh’s Bulwark nerf Granite Maul went from 50% to 60% special attack in PvP

item.title: April 2019
item.description: No trading allowed at ZMI, nerfing ZMI running (allowed for high XP rates at high cost, nerfed an easy money maker for the runners)

item.title: March 2019
item.description: DMM… pretty much the same drama for any DMM final.

item.title: February 2019
item.description: Twisted Bow spawn after an update, later required a server rollback

item.title: January 2019
item.description: Konar Slayer Master was released and later nerfed, due to her global drop table, mainly after someone rolled a 2500 Sara Brew drop which was found to be extremely rare.
